meanings.definition: creasiest (comparative adjective): having the most creases
meanings.sent1: The old shirt was the creasiest of all, with wrinkles everywhere.
meanings.sent2: She carefully folded the paper to avoid creating the creasiest edges.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the creasiest spot on the bed to curl up for a nap.
meanings.sent4: His creasiest thoughts were reflected in the crumpled paper he held.
meanings.sent5: The creasiest part of the map showed where the treasure was hidden.

meanings.definition: creasiest (adverb): in a manner that is the most creased
meanings.sent1: She folded the paper creasiest to fit it into the envelope.
meanings.sent2: The old book opened creasiest at the well-read pages.
meanings.sent3: He walked creasiest through the narrow alley, trying not to bump into anyone.
meanings.sent4: The fabric stretched creasiest where it was folded multiple times.
meanings.sent5: The letter was crumpled creasiest, making it hard to read the words.

meanings.definition: creasiest (noun): the most creased part or area
meanings.sent1: The creasiest of the paper was at the corner where it was folded.
meanings.sent2: She smoothed out the creasiest of the fabric before sewing it together.
meanings.sent3: The creasiest of the map was torn due to frequent use.
meanings.sent4: He carefully ironed the creasiest of his shirts to make them look neat.
meanings.sent5: The creasiest of the document contained the most important information.
